query: SELECT Category, Plan, Version, Company, CLosureDate, GroupCustomerID, GroupCustomerName, BusinessType, DestinationCountry, GroupProductID, GroupProductName, UOM, Quantity, GroupCurrencyTotalAmount, GroupCurrencyCOGS1Amount, GroupCurrencyCOGS2Amount, HomeCurrency, PlanRate, ProductFix, KDP_checksum, KDP_executionId, KDP_loadDT, KDP_DQ, KDP_CLEAN, KDP_IsBlocked, ID FROM ds.STG_val_STG_SALES_PLAN_HIST WHERE CLosureDate >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()) - 2, 1, 1)
